Articles.Content: Hello, I'm Reavermyst, just another wannabe kerbalnaut off to take over the solar system! Don't mind me!
Well, I would say hello, but you said not to mind you.
State your purpose and contents! What is your first mission?

Welcome to the community Reavermyst

Have fun with your planetary conquest and fly safe

State your purpose and contents! What is your first mission?

the Grand Mission: Land a colony on every planet and moon in the Kerbal universe! Our very first mission, is to construct Kerbin's first first star base to lay down infrastructure. We have a station core in orbit, but one of the Kerbonauts sat on the throttle for a little too long and placed it in an eccentric orbit and released the lifter drone, where it used it's fancy science to make itself return to Kerbin on it's own. The lifter drone did make it back home, but the recovery teams found it in a very interesting manner....

This picture was captured by the retrieval team

Maybe we should look into that fancy science a little more closely...
